header.title: Sri Lanka
header.subtitle: COVID-19 Memorial
header.seoDisc: In memory of those we lost to COVID-19 in Sri Lanka

footer.title: COVID-19 Memorial
footer.subtitle: In memory of those we lost to COVID-19 in Sri Lanka.

submitForm.section_consent_1: I hereby confirm that I'm a family member of the deceased or that the family of the deceased have given me their permission to make this submission on their behalf.
submitForm.section_consent_2: I have documents that can verify the information I'm submitting (ex- death certificate or obituary)
submitForm.section_consent_3: I hereby allow the team of Sri Lanka Covid-19 Memorial to store and process this data for the purpose of verifying the information submitted by me.
submitForm.consent_checkbox_label: I agree to the above prerequisites
submitForm.section_details_text: Please share with us the following details about the deceased person. The mandatory details will be displayed on the memorial website and the name will be displayed only if you give consent below.
submitForm.location_label: Village or city the deceased person was from
submitForm.displayName_label: Display their name on the memorial website
submitForm.detailText_label: Anything else you want to share about the deceased person
submitForm.section_verification_text: These details are only for our reference. They will not be displayed on the memorial website or published or shared beyond our team.

formSubmissionSuccess.completed: Your Data Was Recorded, Reference code is {ref}
formSubmissionSuccess.failed: Sorry unable to store record, please try again later
